On Aug 10, 2007, at 7:16 AM, zymeth02 wrote:

> Hi, im new here and also new at NEAT. Im really interested to know
> more about the coevolution setup K. Stanley used in the paper
> "competitive coevolution through evolutionary complexification"

I cannot speak to Ken's setup; however, you could use something  
similar to chess tournaments.  Check out the Glicko2 rating system  
and the Swiss Tournament format.
--
Stephen Waits
steve@...
http://swaits.com/



--Apple-Mail-9-145522582
